name: Drums Hero
description: Drums hero is a drums version of the VR music game. If you are a music player who interested in playing a music. You will love it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 above Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD FX 8250 or above DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: This system requirements are only for VR mode.
